document_data.Synopsis: The annual haunting of a ghost in the streets of [[Loudwater]] is interrupted by a [[groundling]] attack. Their burrowing reveals a previously undiscovered reliquary containing a tangible shard of pure light. Following clues, the party makes their way to the ruin of [[Phantoms' Cloister]], where they find [[Zhentarim]] battling creatures under the control of a vicious [[quasit]].
